"Ohza": "Hey, you're going to practice with the wired lance, are you?"
"Hunters can get away with pushing the limits a little, so go give it all you got."
"Once you've learned the Wired Lance Gear skill, a gear gauge is added to the top of your Weapon Palette. The gear gauge fills up as you land blows with standard wired lance attacks."
"The gear gauge fills up to three bars, and each ensnaring Photon Art you use consumes one bar. Photon Arts unleashed using the gear gauge are more powerful. The gear gauge does not drop over time."
